CustomField.formula: if (NOT(ISpickval(Tier_Status__c,"Tier 2")) && NOT(ISpickval(Tier_Status__c,"Tier 1")) && NOT(ISpickval(Tier_Status__c,"Team Velocity")) && NOT(ISpickval(Tier_Status__c,"CallSource")) && NOT(ISpickval(Tier_Status__c,"TCX")) && NOT(ISpickval(Tier_Status__c,"Auto Alert")) && NOT(Ispickval(CallRevu_Account_Status__c,"Cancelled")),1,0)
CustomField.label: Tier 3 Active
